casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Shawn Loveto CAMERON, Jr., Defendant-Appellant. SC: 155849
COA: 330876 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 20, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to adjourn the case from the October 2018 session of the Court is GRANTED. The clerk is directed to schedule the case for oral argument at a future session of the Court.
